favourite.article: What a relief, reassuring and expression of faith in Christ Jesus. A song that heals the soul, soothes and bring happiness not of this world but heavenly joy.

I had a terrible accident May 2015, in which I fractured my both femurs. I was in the hospital for 4 months. I will never forget the terrible pains I and my family went through. Through it all, this hymn was my steady companion. It gave me hope. It reminded me to trust in Christ's healing power. I knew Jesus sympathizes with me and I was not alone. Glory to God. I can testify to God's healing power.
Amen all my sins are forgiven because I have a sympathizing Jesus. Jesus is the greatest physician that has ever happened to the world. Halleluyah!
Amen to this song. Thank You Jesus for You are the Greatest Physician. We are healed by Your stripes. Amen!!! Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Peace!
Very uplifting from the age of 10 years to my present age of 58 .The great healer is with us praise God!
Thank you! Excellent! Awesome hymn! Praise Jesus! Yeshua!
is such a beautiful hymn
What a beautiful arrangement, love the chords, very nicely done! This is a very beautiful hymn.

Amen to this song. Praise the Lord Jesus heals!!! The wordings of this song are powerful and still carries the healing power of Jesus. I sang it this morning and the Lord touched me. Jehovah Rapha will continue to touch as many that needs His touch again in their lives in Jesus name. Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

At a very darkntime in my life. Jesus gently reminded me of the words "The great Physician now is here" and I googled it on my mobile device. Thank You Lord for your reasssurances through this hymn and thank You too for this website that gave me all the words You wished to say to me.
Great Hymn that brings down miracles. The more you it sing the stronger the meaning.
The hymn I like to sing, it refreshes my soul. Whenever I sing this hymn I feel the Etenal Kingdom of God; be blessed the composer of this hymn.

I have enjoyed the various aspects of the ministry of Jesus Christ, the Great Physician in my life for several years now and I love to sing the glory of His sweet and comforting Name as expressed in this song again and again.

Oh! Love ones, may the Good Lord bless and keep you. I'm so happy to know that each one of you love Jesus the Reedemer. If anyone can have the words of this song in Zulu for me? See you on the meet in air (rapture) and God bless you.
Honestly speaking I have heard this song over and over without paying attention to the words... but when I did today, it sums up to what Jesus does and will do for Love... indeed I am healed. Amen.
The love I have for this song is as to Uganda my deteriorating country.
The most beautiful song I have ever heard. Every I time listen to it, I have the feeling that Jesus is healing someone somewhere. It melts my heart.
This songs releases the balm in Gilead in the direction of as many that need the healing hands of the perfect physician JESUS. Thank You Jesus.
This hymn has ministered a lot to me, when I am strong, I do sing it and divine healing is restore to my soul. I am happy singing it everyday... Thank You JESUS.
I love every word of the hymn, it means so much to me. Jesus is my Great Physician... Praise God.
This is the song my husband sung before going In for surgery and he came out. It was successful. Indeed Jesus is a great physican. To God be the glory!!!!
One of my favourite hymns of all time. Touches me all the time! Jesus Blessed Jesus.

Praise the Lord Jesus heals!!! The wordings of this song are powerful and still carries the healing power of Jesus. I sang it this morning and the Lord touched me. Jehovah Rapha will continue to touch as many that needs His touch again in their lives in Jesus name. Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless.
The great physician now is here... What an inspirational song! Thank You JESUS.
this song inspires me a lot.

Hunter was born in Ireland, and at the age of 6 moved to the United States. He was professor of Hebrew at Allegheny College and later became a Methodist Episcopal minister. He wrote over 125 hymns. ----- The last 2 lines of stanza 2 originally say: Go on your way in peace to Heav’n, And wear a crown with Jesus. -------------------- There are 2 additional stanzas following stanza 3 above: 4. The children, too, both great and small, Who love the name of Jesus, May now accept the gracious call To work and live for Jesus. ------------------------ 5. Come, brethren, help me sing His praise, Oh, praise the name of Jesus; Oh, sisters, all your voices raise, Oh, bless the name of Jesus. --------------------- There is an additional last stanza: 7. And when to that bright world above, We rise to see our Jesus, We’ll sing around the throne of love His name, the name of Jesus. ----------------------- The additional stanza posted by Elizabeth on Feb 1, 2014 is a nice one too. It is from the 7th Day Adventist hymnal.
Great inspiring song....

What a gracious song that ministers healing to the soul, spirit and body. What a joy, splendor and happiness it will be when we all meet at the feet of Christ in heaven, sickness and sorrow we shall bear no more but ever rejoicing till all eternity.

Slept last night with a burdened heart, but dreamt of myself singing this song in the midst of a crowd. And in the morning I woke singing it in tears. And then I realize the extent of His love for me. Thank You Jesus.

I fully understand the meaning of this beautiful hymn. There's a superb interpretation in Yoruba language by Psalmos which can be downloaded on Spinlet. Always, always brings tears of joy and reverence to my eyes!
The last stanza goes... And when He comes to bring the crown The Crown of life and glory Then by His side we will sit down And tell redemption's story

Praise the Lord I am healed.The wordings of this song are powerful and still carries the healing power of Jesus. I sang it this morning and the Lord touched me. Jehovah Rapha will continue to touch as many that needs His touch again in their lives in Jesus name. Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless.

Wonderful! Tried to find this hymn in my "old church hymnal" and couldn't. Now I have a healthy respect for sites like these. Was amazed that you would have the words. Thank you, thank you! My cousin's daughter is in the hospital and sent to ask for prayers. I quoted the first two lines to him and started singing the chorus afterwards. I grew up in Jamaica singing this song at church especially in prayer meetings or to start prayers for healing. The Great Physician is still in business! Praise the wonderful and powerful name of Jesus!

Whatever inward conflict or infirmity we are cumbered with we can cast ourself down at His feet, He never did nor will He ever turn the needy suppliant away but will send him away rejoicing. What is your petition? Mine is...... What is it that shall be done unto thee? Lord, that You may give me to look away from all that distracts, even from felt deficiencies of what I see a Christian is to be in his temper and love, to look unto You alone for only as I behold Thee as Thou art am I transformed into the beautific likeness.

Can't hold tears streaming down my eyes this morning as I heard this song in worship form. it stirs up my spirit man and awakens my heart to Jesus' infallible love for me. Keep listening, it's a good antidote for a depressed soul in despair.
Thank God for His Saving grace and His healing Covenant.

Praise God Brethren, Hope you all had a blessed weekend. Mine was fair, nursing a breakup can be challenging but with God's love, HE makes us go through well. I listened to this song a lot while I was at a Seventh Day school, Seventh day are people who love to sing a lot. This morning I woke up and had this song in mind. Google helps me usually. I will listen to it as I work the whole day. This song keeps me lots lots of hope, faith and love. Be blessed Brethren.

I live in Canada. When I was a young man I spent a year in Kenya, I used to hear the workers singing this song in Kiswahili. I did not understand the words , when I came home to Canada I was in a church service and they sung it in English. Finally I realized what I had been hearing in Africa! In Africa they sung it with a beautiful African rhythm. God Bless you my African brothers and sisters, keep on singing.....
He's not a great physician; He is the GREATEST PHYSICIAN. Have got no enough time to tell you how HE made me WHOLE. JESUS, blessed JESUS.
What an Indefinable Jesus and Master!!!

Hello there,
Jesus is risen, so the song should be, All glory to the risen Lamb! Thanks a lot and God bless you all.
The kind of song one will call a spiritual song.
A soothing, soul-touching, consoling, sweet melody in harmony with the name of Jesus. It connects me to God all the time I listen to it. Glory to God.
I love this song too much. I always sing it when I am down. It boosts my morale.
God bless you.
These hymns are spirit filled no doubt. God bless you guys.

The Great Physician who has seen me through sickness, my survival through the oxygen machine for 4 days and today I lift my hands and sing indeed the Great Physician is near. God lives I have experienced his great power that exceeds all power. Glory be to God Almighty indeed his mercy is from everlasting to everlasting.
Stay blessed.
Whenever this song plays it would remind me that there is healing, forgiveness of sin, restoration and salvation in this precious name of Jesus. I really love this song.
This song "The Great Physician" just healed me now! I sang it repeatedly for 7 times with faith and I was healed.

Great song. I wonder what the author was thinking when he/she composed such a song that goes deep into one's marrow, such a song that rekindles one's love and adoration for the Master who gave His life to earn such a great name, that is ever sufficient for ALL.
I love this song because it inspires me a lot...
Am always filled with this hymn......Oh My God...what shall I say in return...I love You Lord.
Just believe Him now for your Salvation and complete healing. Jesus is Lord !

This song comforts and heals my broken spirit from childhood. My daddy loved it, and we always sang it for morning devotions or when times were hard. This song comes to my mind whenever there is a need to seek God's face for healing either personally or for somebody. Classical songs must be preserved because the writers were inspired by the Most High God.
Inspirational song, matchless and ageless. this is an incredible hymn. The Holy Ghost sung for all and in all times. A song of spirit in a time of divine connection re-establishment and communion...

This song tells me that Jesus Christ is the Master of the Universe. He is that Great Physician. Whenever I'm sick this song brings complete healing to me. Sing it. Believe it. You will never remain the same. Praise the living God!
A great song. It always brings back the place of Jesus in my life. I'm almost always moved to tears when singing it. A masterpiece and perhaps the best carol never sung.
Can't stop shedding tears over this song. It's my favourite, my dad's favourite and the therapy that healed my dad alongside prayers, indeed we have a great physician in Christ!!
Thank you very much for making such pleasant song avail online. It makes me to love Jesus more and reaffirm my loyalty to Jesus.
This song brings revival and refreshing to the soul of the weary pilgrim bringing assurance of the nearness of the Saviour's healing power.

I'm really delighted to find this song online as I've longed to know the wordings of this song as its my best song from childhood in my native dialect. It's a very comforting song and it's so reassuring to know Jesus feels for me always. I'm highly privileged. Thanks so much for making it available.
I love the your version of it. The greatest Physician is always around us and all we need to do is to open our heart for Him to perform that miracle that we desire. I love the song.
Hallelujah!

This song is a prophetic song; makes me relax and more confident most especially when I have some kind of heavy heart; It recalls my consciousness that I am not alone that the Sympathizing Jesus is near... So no matter what you are going through know that you are not alone... Be blessed as you listen and sing this song.

Praise His name. The Great Physician is always near, reaching out to comfort us in our distress, our pain and sorrow. Whatever your difficulty may be, whatever you are going through today, Jesus is right there with you. He knows and He cares.
This song always stirs up in me the consciousness that My Saviour is always by my side.
At the mention of this name (JESUS) every knee shall bow. Thank You Lord for the healing!

I started singing the chorus of this hymn while praying this morning. I just know it is God speaking to me through it because it just came out like that. I thank the Almighty God for giving me this hymn.

This hymn reassures me that I have victory in Jesus. It reminds me that in good times and bad times I only need to call the name Jesus. It gives me confidence that I am saved, I am loved and I am redeemed.
This translates me to a Heavenly Realm and gives me assurance that my diseases are healed in His name.

Each time I sing this my spirit is highly lifted getting to all that Christ settled on Calvary and new fellowship I've been brought into. The angels worshipped with veiled and here I am with open face beholding His glory as that of the only Son of God. If only men will grasp this sweet song, a life of victory over sin and sickness. what a glory!
